verdict.summary: The AI Auto Chat Translation feature mostly complies with GDPR regulations for social media applications, ensuring fairness, transparency, data privacy by design, and documenting data handling practices. However, there is a residual risk of mistranslations that could potentially disclose sensitive information.

issues.title: Mistranslation Risk
issues.description: The feature automatically translates chat messages in real-time, which may lead to mistranslations that compromise the principles of fairness and transparency as defined by GDPR.
issues.impact: Unintended disclosure or misuse of sensitive information
issues.remediation: Implement machine learning models with higher accuracy and robustness in handling sensitive messages

issues.title: Compliance with GDPR Data Protection Principles
issues.description: The AI Auto Chat Translation feature upholds data protection principles as defined by GDPR, including fairness, transparency, data privacy by design, and the recording of processing activities.
issues.impact: Potential fines under GDPR regulations if non-compliance is found

evidence_cited.content: Personal data should be processed lawfully, fairly and in a transparent manner.
Users must be informed about the collection and use of their personal data.
The principles of data protection by design and by default apply to all processing activities.
Data controllers must maintain a record of processing activities.
Appropriate technical and organizational measures should be in place to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk.
